name: Pouffe with Ball Feet
description: The Pouffe with Ball Feet is a versatile and stylish accent piece designed with practicality in mind. It features a compact design and is elevated by solid timber 'bun-feet', which draws inspiration from the elegant and minimalist designs found in Japanese aesthetics. Handmade in the UK, this handy little pouffe can be used as a dressing table stool, a textured footrest and also makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests. Now available in two colourways: Checkerboard and Boucle.
